description: the apartment is located in the heart of the so called triangle of art within short walking distance you will find the museums of reina sofia, el prado, thyssen bornemisza, and the new caixa forum it is within 15 minutes walking distance from madrids most characteristic places parque del retiro, plaza mayor, puerta del sol and the city centres main shopping area closeby is the old historical city centre of madrid the area offers a wide choice of amenities cultural centres, national film centre, small theatres, cinemas etc you will also discover plenty of tapas bars, as well as traditional  international restaurants public transport is easily accessible atochas station is within a 10 min walk there is also 2 metro lines lines 1 and 3 five minutes away and 8 bus lines, one of which crosses the city from north to south

summary: a modern house by the sea in the west coast of the mallorca island with views into the isla dragonera from the infinity pool, built on the front line of the coast  designed into a modern style, the house has room for up to 8 people four rooms, 3 bathrooms and amazing terraces  andratx is a safe area with a special climate so its warm in the spring, summer and autumn, but its never too hot because of the location of the house that gets the sea breeze its cold in the winter  you have a certain direct access to the sea, being careful with the climbing  the port of andratx is fifteen minutes away if you walk, and five if you drive its recommended that you rent a car but there are taxis as well  there are nice restaurants around and also some towns which are not far away the island is also worth some trips around the north is very beautiful and there are nice beaches all around the island from the house, theres a small beach but its recommended to explore others to get a v

summary: this sunny and charming apartment has much to offer, very comfortable and cozy  with views overlooking the rooftops of the 7th arrondissement the apartment is  located on the 3th floor of a building with an elevator  the access is secured by a door code and a second gate with a code as well  the building itself has a beautiful courtyard, the windows are doubleglazed so the apartment is very quiet, the apartment is always full of light the  apartment has a living room with high ceiling, and also a mezzanine where is the bathroom and the bedroom through the bedroom window you have access to the terrace with a 360 degree view of paris located just behind the prestigious orsay museum and the charm of the seine river two steps away from the apartment with its own distinct and charming personality this is a very special apartment for a memorable stay in paris it is a mansion built in 1705 for the marquis de nointel this hotel particulier was built on land known as the latch belo

summary: authentic mallorcan finca 90000m2 of land, situated in a small valley near the quiet village of costitx it is surrounded by countryside, mountains and a stream, that provide a quiet and rural, typical of indoor mallorca in spring and autumn, the river is filled with water, forming an underground stream that is heard in certain parts of the house the house has been recently renovated and appropriate to the level of a modern house, with all their equipment accordingly, always keeping the characteristic details  of mallorcan genuinely home  the villa is located in a rural setting, quiet with nice views and good connections to both the northern beaches puerto pollensa, puerto alcudia or the serra de tramuntana at the same time, it is noteworthy that the pool is surrounded by natural sand in order to create a small beach where you can sunbathe, relax, or, where children can play freely moreover, the farm is a few miles from costitx, a true inland town, where you can enjoy the market

description: the flat is located right above malasana, one the most visited and upbeat neighborhoods in madrid, with plenty of restaurants, independent stores and great night life you could easily skip taking the subway during your stay if you like to walk quevedo metro station is 1 minute away, and you can also take subway lines 2, 4, 1 and 7 in less than 5 minutes walking the flat is inside a corrala madrilena, a typical construction of madrid which is a wooden patio with many flats sorrounding it ill be happy to offer assistance and give tips about the city and its surroundings im a huge lover or nature and adventure so i can help you out if you are a thrill seeker malasana is the trendiest district in town modern restaurants and secondhand shops live alongside traditional bars and markets people have been going to for ages its also one of the popular nightlife areas in madrid tribunal is where everyone meets for a beer, coffee or just to take a stroll along its narrow streets to s

summary: sol is a huge, quiet room on the second floor with a queensize bed 150 x 200cm and ensuite bathroom  it has a comfortable lounging area and stunning views to the east and the north across the village casa mona  a place to stay
description: sol is a huge, quiet room on the second floor with a queensize bed 150 x 200cm and ensuite bathroom  it has a comfortable lounging area and stunning views to the east and the north across the village casa mona  a place to stay located in the quiet, historic centre of llubi in the heart of mallorca, casa mona is a fine example of mallorcan architecture from the late 19th century  casa mona is the place to stay for a romantic holiday, to explore mallorca with family or friends, as a base for cycling or hiking, or as a retreat for writers and artists casa mona has the charm of yesterday with todays modern amenities  every lightfilled room has perfect attention to detail and comfort  casa mona has four large double bedrooms with shared bathrooms one large double room with ensuite two large private lounges a secluded treefilled garden secure facilities for bicycles and ample parking  casa mona is the place to stay if you want to avoid crowds it is only 30 minutes by car

summary: for its wonderful location in the trendy part of town and its wonderfully cosy interiors, this is a perfect shortstay option for a couple or lone visitor to the spanish capital
description: for its wonderful location in the trendy part of town and its wonderfully cosy interiors, this is a perfect shortstay option for a couple or lone visitor to the spanish capital its interiors are simple, yet elegant, echoing its geographical composition by fusing design elements of the past with some of the present all of the pieces, from the candle holders on the authentic timber coffee table to the patio chair, have been handpicked by our designers colours have been kept simple and hushed because the space already enjoys an abundance of natural sunlight, which guests can soak up on the adjoining outdoor terrace the combined living and dining room features an open plan arrangement, with a large sofa in the former for relaxation   and a rounded dining table for four in the latter this apartment has wood flooring throughout, interrupted only by the carefullychosen rugs in the living room and master bedroom, and by the stone and ceramic tiles of the patio and bathroom respectively

summary: habitacion individual con mucha luz, nada de ruido en pleno centro de madrid, muy cerca del palacio real y gran via, cerca de museos y malasana zona de copas
description: esta muy bien ubicado, silencioso, con mucha luz, wifi, lavadora, microondas, calefaccion central, muy buen rollo, limpieza se pide lo mismo   habitacion individual, bano compartido y cocina compartida, no fumar en espacios comunes, no fiestas, limpieza de los espacios comunes corre de mi cuenta me gusta hablar con la gente que se aloja en casa, saber idiomas y culturas, indico donde estan los museos, bares y sitios de interes de la zona  es un barrio muy tranquilo, donde se puede encontrar de todo  cerca hay metro, autobuses y lineas directas al aeropuerto de adolfo suarez y la estacion de tren de atocha  en la casa hay perro, me gustan mucho los animales,,, mi perro es muy bueno, no ladra y es muy educado  habitacion individual, bano compartido y cocina compartida, no fumar en espacios comunes, no fiestas, limpieza de los espacios comunes corre de mi cuenta mantener  limpia la habitacion y cambiar semanalmente las sabanas  higiene ante todo gracias me gusta hablar con la gente
